templates.template: ${control:var(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget)}.addListener(${type:link( SWT.Activate, SWT.Arm, SWT.Close, SWT.Collapse, SWT.Deactivate, SWT.DefaultSelection, SWT.Deiconify, SWT.Dispose, SWT.DragDetect, SWT.EraseItem, SWT.Expand, SWT.FocusIn, SWT.FocusOut, SWT.HardKeyDown, SWT.HardKeyUp, SWT.Help, SWT.Hide, SWT.Iconify, SWT.ImeComposition, SWT.KeyDown, SWT.KeyUp, SWT.MeasureItem, SWT.MenuDetect, SWT.Modify, SWT.MouseDoubleClick, SWT.MouseDown, SWT.MouseEnter, SWT.MouseExit, SWT.MouseHover, SWT.MouseMove, SWT.MouseUp, SWT.MouseWheel, SWT.Move, SWT.Paint, SWT.PaintItem, SWT.Resize, SWT.Selection, SWT.SetData, SWT.Settings, SWT.Show, SWT.Traverse, SWT.Verify)}, new ${listener:newType(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Listener)}(){ public void handleEvent(${event:newType(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Event)} e) { ${imp:import(org.eclipse.swt.SWT)}${cursor} } });
